testcase.classname: Verification of add filter to company functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether user is able to add new filters.
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on Show filter in Companies Module..........................passed And user selects appropriate value for Search as <"Name"> , Operator as <"Equals"> and Equals as <"Capgemini Worldwide"> in Companies Module.passed And User clicks on Save Search in Companies Module..........................passed Then Filter should get saved and displayed in Filters Dropdown in Companies Module.passed

testcase.classname: Verification of add filter to company functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether user is able to apply filters on companies added to view them
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on Show filter in Companies Module..........................passed And user selects appropriate value for Search as <"<search>"> , Operator as <"<operator>"> and Equals as <"<equals>"> in Companies Module.passed And User clicks on Search in Companies Module...............................passed Then Companies should get filtered appropriately............................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of add filter to company functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether user is able to remove filters if required.
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on Show filter in Companies Module..........................passed And user selects appropriate value for Search as <"<search>"> , Operator as <"<operator>"> and Equals as <"<equals>"> in Companies Module.passed And User clicks on Search in Companies Module...............................passed And User clicks on Clear in Companies Module................................passed Then Filter results should get removed in Companies Module..................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of create a company functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether redirection happens to create companies form after clicking on create.
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on create in Companies Module...............................passed Then Create Company form should open........................................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of create a company functionality
testcase.name: To validate if the user has entered details in the all mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on create in Companies Module...............................passed And User Fills the Company Name as <"Capgemini"> in Companies Module........passed And User clicks on save in Companies Module.................................passed Then Company data should get saved..........................................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of create a company functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether user is able to cancel the creation of companies is required
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on create in Companies Module...............................passed And User clicks on cancel in Companies Module...............................passed Then Form should close and user should be redirected to the Companies Module.passed

testcase.classname: Verification of create a company functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether user is able to unable to create company if Mandatory details not filled.
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on create in Companies Module...............................passed And User clicks on save in Companies Module.................................passed Then User should get error stating to enter mandatory details in Companies Module.passed

testcase.classname: Verification of create a company functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether valid mobile number is accpeting only digits in create company
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on create in Companies Module...............................passed And User Fills the Company Name as <"Capgemini With Number"> in Companies Module.passed And User Enters Mobile number as <"9987326348"> in Companies Module.........passed And User clicks on save in Companies Module.................................passed Then Company data should get saved..........................................passed

testcase.classname: Verification of delete a company functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether user is able to delete company after clicking on delete button/
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on Delete button in Companies Module........................passed And User clicks on Confirm Delete in Companies Module.......................passed Then Company should get deleted and user is back on Companies module........passed

testcase.classname: Verification of delete a company functionality
testcase.name: To validate user is able to cancel the deletion process if required.
testcase.system-out: Given User is Logged in and is in Companies Module..........................passed And User clicks on Delete button in Companies Module........................passed And User clicks on Cancel button in Companies Module........................passed Then Company should not get deleted and user is back on Companies module....passed

testcase.classname: Verification of delete Contact(s) functionality
testcase.name: To validate whether the user is able to Cancel the deletion process if requred

testcase.classname: Verification of add filter to Contact functionality
testcase.name: To validate that the user can filter the contacts based on various criterias
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Contacts page and applying filters.....................passed And User clicks on the show filters button..................................passed And User selects the type for search........................................passed And User selects an operator for search filter..............................passed And User enters the value with <"Anusmita">.................................passed And User clicks on the filter button........................................passed Then User is able to view the contacts with the filters applied.............passed
